item.title: Pay $19 to get 25% off on ticket from HOHO Travel Service. Explore the city like never before! The tour covers all famous monuments, museums and marketsPay $19 to get 25% off on ticket from HOHO Travel Service. Explore the city like never before! The tour
item.description:
Looking for an option to take a break from your monotonous routine and busy schedule to revive and refresh? how about seeing true colours of Delhi with utmost comfort, convenience and at a pocket friendly cost? Explore the vivacious,
multihued and versatile culture of India. HOHO Bus Service lets you enjoy a family outing and Delhi sightseeing in a comfy, AC bus for a pocket friendly price. Now, you can explore the rustic charm of Old Delhi, relish culinary delights, shop for artifacts and souvenirs and soak in the culture of the city, all at once! Pay $ 19 to get 25% off on ticket from HOHO Bus Service. Explore the city like never before!
item.content:encoded:
• Offer includes: 25% off on sightseeing tour tickets
  • The tour covers all famous monuments, museums and markets
  • See below for routes
  • Every bus has a 'guest relations executive' to provide information about the sights
  • HOHO boasts of an international presence and operates in London, Rome, New York, Sydney, Barcelona and other cities across the globe
  • Get Travel at their all boarding (pick up/drop) points every 45 minutes (starting 8:30 am)
  • Call at HOHO Bus customer care between 2:00 pm to 5:00 pm and 6:30 pm to 8:30 pm
  • Applicable taxes included

item.title: A superb holiday offer! Pay $52 to enjoy 4D/3N couple stay worth $85 with United Lifestyles Pvt Ltd.
item.description:
Call at 1231456789 or mail at info@test.in with necessary details (name, age, contact no, preferred dates of visiting, place of visit and mydala voucher code) for booking.
A superb holiday offer! Pay Rs. 3333 to enjoy 4D/3N couple stay worth Rs. 4444 with United Lifestyles Pvt Ltd.
item.content:encoded:
• Offer includes: 4D/3N stay
  • Accommodation on twin sharing basis
  • Simple booking procedure, see below
  • Applicable taxes included

item.title: $25 -- 10-Nt Bangkok & Phuket Break w/Flights & More for 2. Visit Bangkok and Phuket on this 10-day Thailand package from ME Travel for just $2599
item.description:
Visit Bangkok and Phuket on this 10-day Thailand package from ME Travel for just $2599 for two people including flights from Perth. This deal will save you $1093 off what you would usually pay.
Departures from Sydney, Melbourne and Brisbane are also available for just $2799 for two people. Children aged 2-11 can travel for just $950 per child while single travelers will pay just $1750 departing from Perth and $1850 from Sydney, Melbourne and Brisbane.
item.content:encoded:
Vouchers must be purchased by 23 January but could sell out before. Child vouchers are not inclusive of spa treatment. When you are ready to book, contact ME travel at info@metravel.com.au and mention your Travelzoo voucher. Vouchers can be redeemed for stays from 13 March to 14 September.

Blackout dates: 28-31 March; 1-21 April; 23-30 June; 1-13 July. All tax is included. Vouchers are not refundable and cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion. Once you have booked your holiday with ME Travel, no cancellations are permitted or your voucher is subject to forfeiture.

item.title: Visit Bangkok and Phuket on this 10-day Thailand package from ME Travel for just $77 for two people including flights from Perth.
item.description:
Departures from Sydney, Melbourne and Brisbane are also available for just $2799 for two people.
The official 5-star Pathumwan Princess Hotel has won multiple awards including a 2012 World Luxury Hotel Award and a Certificate of Excellence from TripAdvisor.
item.content:encoded:
Vouchers must be purchased by 23 January but could sell out before. Child vouchers are not inclusive of spa treatment. When you are ready to book, contact ME travel and mention your Travelzoo voucher. Vouchers can be redeemed for stays from 13 March to 14 September.

Blackout dates: 28-31 March; 1-21 April; 23-30 June; 1-13 July. All tax is included. Vouchers are not refundable and cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer or promotion. Once you have booked your holiday with ME Travel, no cancellations are permitted or your voucher is subject to forfeiture.
